query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and estp.prelinkid=est.linkid and (estp.operatetype=54 or estp.operatetype=56) and est.operatetype=46 and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.OPERATEUSERID is not null and est.complainttype1 in (@complainttype1@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.senduserid,est.todeptid,est.complainttype1,est.operatetime,est.sendtime from est_complaint est ,est_complaint estp where est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and estp.prelinkid=est.linkid and (estp.operatetype=54 or estp.operatetype=56) and est.operatetype=46 and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@'

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.completeflag=2 and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.complainttype1 in (@complainttype1@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.senduserid,est.todeptid,est.complainttype1,est.operatetime,est.sendtime from est_complaint est ,est_complaint estp where est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and estp.prelinkid=est.linkid and (estp.operatetype=54 or estp.operatetype=56) and est.operatetype=46 and est.OPERATEUSERID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@'

query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and estp.prelinkid=est.linkid and (estp.operatetype=54 or estp.operatetype=56) and est.operatetype=46 and est.OPERATEROLEID in ('@subroleFromDeptid@') and est.OPERATEROLEID is not null and est.complainttype1 in (@complainttype1@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.senduserid,est.todeptid,est.complainttype1,est.operatetime,est.sendtime from est_complaint est ,est_complaint estp where est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and estp.prelinkid=est.linkid and (estp.operatetype=54 or estp.operatetype=56) and est.operatetype=46 and (est.mainQcRejectTimes=0 or est.mainQcRejectTimes is null) and est.OPERATEROLEID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@'

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.completeflag=2 and est.OPERATEUSERID in (@userByDeptid@) and est.complainttype1 in (@complainttype1@) and est.TODEPTID in (@areaid@)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid ,est.sheetid,est.title, est.senduserid, est.todeptid,est.complainttype1,est.operatetime,est.sendtime from est_complaint est ,est_complaint estp where est.ENDTIME>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.ENDTIME<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.status=1 and (est.operatetype=46 or est.operatetype=11) and est.completeflag=2 and est.OPERATEROLEID='@s1@' and est.complainttype1='@s2@' and est.TODEPTID='@s3@'
